Text:
Hi Guys & Gals,

Enjoy!

I am happy to share all my collection with you!

I very much appreciate all the efforts that you are deploying to keep the Fu alive by seeding these torrents, whenever possible and with the means that you have at your disposal, and I sincerely thank you all.

Together, let's keep the Fu alive, REGARDLESS OF THE CARYING BOAT!

If you happen to be an active seeders, please drop your hotmail email address so that other Fu Members could contact you for a possible reseed.

Subtitles file available at:

For time correction, please use the online script available at:
http://submerge.delarue-berlin.de/
What's the name of the song in the end?

http://www.opensubtitles.com/en/search/sublanguageid-dut,eng/idmovie-29732

Thanks Uploader!

for some reason, I can't get any of the subtitle links to do anything but give me a blank browser window.  No matter, I can watch it raw and understand what's going on with my limited Japanese, but it's something that someone else down the road might also have a problem with...
